description: connect to hubspot apis to interact with your hubspot account and perform a variety of different actions.

blocks.name: getContentEvents

args.name: startDate
args.info: The beginning value of the query range, in UTC, in milliseconds

args.name: endDate
args.info: The end value of the query range, in UTC, in milliseconds

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header isn't present

args.name: limit
args.info: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to 100.

args.name: offset
args.info: Starting value to page by. Defaults to 0.

args.name: contentCategory
args.info: The category of content to filter by, values include "blog-post", "email"

args.name: campaignGuid
args.info: Show tasks by campaign guid. Multiple can be specified.
args.includeNoCampaigns: Show tasks without a campaign specified (true, false). Defaults to false.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

blocks.description: Get events from the calendar. The endpoint supports filtering to get the specific events you want.

blocks.name: getAllCalendarEvents

args.name: startDate
args.info: The beginning value of the query range, in UTC, in milliseconds

args.name: endDate
args.info: The end value of the query range, in UTC, in milliseconds

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header isn't present

args.name: limit
args.info: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to 100.

args.name: offset
args.info: Starting value to page by. Defaults to 0.

args.name: contentCategory
args.info: The category of content to filter by, values include "blog-post", "email"

args.name: campaignGuid
args.info: Show tasks by campaign guid. Multiple can be specified.

args.name: includeNoCampaigns
args.info: Show tasks without a campaign specified (true, false). Defaults to false.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

blocks.description: Get events from the calendar. The endpoint supports filtering to get the specific events you want.

blocks.name: createTask

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header is not present

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

args.name: eventDate
args.info: When the task is set to be due, in milliseconds since the epoch

args.name: eventType
args.info: Type of calendar event; for tasks this is always PUBLISHING_TASK

args.name: category
args.info: type of task; one of BLOG_POST, EMAIL, LANDING_PAGE, CUSTOM

args.name: state
args.info: value of TODO or DONE

args.name: campaignGuid
args.info: value of campaign GUID associated with Task

args.name: name
args.info: Name of Task

args.name: description
args.info: description of Task

args.name: ownerId
args.info: HubSpot id of the user that the task is assigned to. See the Owners API to get a list of owner Ids

args.name: topicIds
args.info: Array: The list of ids of topics associated with the associated Blog Post, if any. Otherwise null. Only read for BLOG_POST Tasks. See Topics API to get a list of topic ids.

args.name: contentGroupId
args.info: The ID of the content group (aka blog) that the associated Blog Post will belong to, if any. Only read for BLOG_POST Tasks. See Blog API to get a list of blogs ids.

args.name: templatePath
args.info: (optional) The template to use for emails and landing pages. only read for EMAIL and LANDING_PAGE categories.

blocks.description: Create a new Task. Creating a task of type BLOG_POST, EMAIL, or LANDING_PAGE will create a draft of the respective content and associate it with the Task, returning a contentId in the response.

blocks.name: getCalendarTaskByID

args.name: taskId
args.info: The ID of the required task

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header isn't present

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

blocks.description:
Get a specific calendar task by ID.
This endpoint returns a a task by specifying the ID of that task

blocks.name: updateCalendarTask

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header isn't present

args.name: taskId
args.info: Unique identifier for the task to delete

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

args.name: eventDate
args.info: When the task is set to be due, in milliseconds since the epoch

args.name: eventType
args.info: Type of calendar event; for tasks this is always PUBLISHING_TASK

args.name: category
args.info: type of task; one of BLOG_POST, EMAIL, LANDING_PAGE, CUSTOM. This must match existing value.

args.name: state
args.info: value of TODO or DONE

args.name: category
args.info: type of task; one of BLOG_POST, EMAIL, LANDING_PAGE, CUSTOM. This must match existing value.

args.name: campaignGuid
args.info: value of campaign GUID associated with Task

args.name: topicIds
args.info: The list of ids of topics associated with the associated Blog Post, if any. Otherwise null. Only read for BLOG_POST Tasks. See Topics API to get a list of topic ids.

args.name: name
args.info: Name of Task

args.name: description
args.info: description of Task.

args.name: ownerId
args.info: HubSpot id of the user that the task is assigned to. See the Owners API to get a list of owner Ids.

blocks.description: Update a Task. this action will replace any existing allowed fields specified. Any fields not included will not change from existing values.

blocks.name: deleteCalendarTask

args.name: hapikey
args.info: API key if Authorization header isn't present

args.name: taskId
args.info: Unique identifier for the task to delete

args.name: accessToken
args.info: if hapikey isn't present

blocks.description: Deletes Task from system. If there is a content object (Blog post, email, landing page) associated, they will not be affected.
